:::{#hero-heading}

I'm Purushottam Mohanty, a 2nd year PhD student in Economics at [Duke University](https://econ.duke.edu). I'm interested in topics in development economics and political economy.  

Before starting my PhD, I was a predoc for Prof. [Oeindrila Dube](http://odube.net) at the [Becker Friedman Institute, University of Chicago](http://bfi.uchicago.edu). Prior to that, I worked as a Senior Data Associate at [Good Business Lab](http://goodbusinesslab.org), in India.  

## Education

- PhD in Economics, Duke University (2024-)
- Masters in Analysis and Policy in Economics (APE), Paris School of Economics (2018-20)
- B.A. (Honors) Economics, University of Delhi (2015-18)

:::
